name: King of the Couch: Zoovival
description: Real-time natural selection! Who will survive, a bear with a cheese or a shark with a shotgun? King of the Couch: Zoovival is the latest evolution of the platform battle arena game genre! Fight as an animal, with a wide assortment of weapons, on multiple unique battle arenas in King of the Couch: Zoovival.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 CPU 930 @ 2.80GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 560 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1000 MB available space
